Job Description: We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our Data Platform Team and build a world-class data solution that powers crucial business decisions throughout the organization.      You will partner with teams at Atlassian across various initiatives, working with them to understand the gaps, bring your findings back to the team, and work on building these capabilities.    On your first day, well expect you to have:     Minimum relevant industry experience of 2 years   Bachelors degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent   Proficiency in any modern object-oriented programming language (e.g., Java, Kotlin, Go, Scala etc.)   Experience crafting and implementing highly scalable and performant RESTful micro-services        Nice to haves:     Experience with API design and data modeling   Experience with AWS   Hands-on experience managing or integrating with large-scale transactional or NoSQL datastores   Experience with Java, Kotlin or GoLang
